mapper.delete: DELETE FROM friend WHERE (mem1_id = #{mem1Id} AND mem2_id = #{mem2Id}) OR (mem1_id = #{mem2Id} AND mem2_id = #{mem1Id})
mapper.select: SELECT m.mem_id, m.email, m.password, m.nickname, m.gender, m.profile_img FROM friend f JOIN member m ON ( (f.mem1_id = #{VALUE} AND m.mem_id = f.mem2_id) OR (f.mem2_id = #{VALUE} AND m.mem_id = f.mem1_id) ) WHERE f.mem1_id = #{VALUE} OR f.mem2_id = #{VALUE} ORDER BY m.mem_id
